spec_data.Name: perl-Shell-Guess
spec_data.Description:
The Shell::Guess Perl module makes a reasonably aggressive attempt to
determine the shell being employed by the user, either the shell that executed
the Perl script directly, or the users' login shell.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 11 Aug 2017 09:33:53 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Make an educated guess about the shell in use
